tit.cmt: タイトルなので大文字にしました。

sen.j: 源氏物語千年紀（げんじものがたりせんねんき）とは、源氏物語の成立千年を記念して実施される様々な事業である。
sen.e: The thousand-year anniversary of the Tale of Genji refers to various events that are held to commemorate the anniversary of the passing of a thousand years since the Tale of Genji was written.

sen.j: 紫式部日記の1008年（寛弘5年）11月1日の条に、「若紫」や「源氏」などの記述があることを根拠とする。
sen.e: It is based on the evidence that there is a description of 'Wakamurasaki' (Lady Murasaki) and 'Genji' in the entry for December 7, 1008 in the Murasaki Shikibu nikki (Diary of Lady Murasaki Shikibu).

sen.j: 2008年（平成20年）が、源氏物語が読まれていたことが記録のうえで確認されるときからちょうど一千年を迎える。
sen.e: 2008 marks exactly when a thousand years have passed since the time when records confirm that the Tale of Genji was already being read.

sen.e: November 1: Eight promoters including Genshitsu SEN (the representative), Ken AKIYAMA, Takeshi UMEHARA, Jakucho SETOUCHI, Donald Keene, Toru HAGA, Yasuhiko MURAI and Kimiko REIZEI, made 'an appeal for the thousand-year anniversary of the Tale of Genji'.

sen.e: Starting with Kyoto prefecture, Kyoto city, Uji city and the Kyoto Chamber of Commerce and Industry, which have deep connections with the Tale of Genji, the organization also consists of prefectures and associations in the Kinki area and the Agency for Cultural Affairs.
